author: Linus Torvalds
quote: Once you start thinking more about where you want to be than about making the best product, you're screwed.

author: Alan Kay
quote: Simple things should be simple and complex things should be possible.

author: Terry A. Davis
quote: An idiot admires complexity, a genius admires simplicity.

author: Peter Drucker
quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

author: Linus Torvalds
quote: Those that can, do. Those that can't, complain.

author: Richard P. Feynman
quote: I'm smart enough to know that I'm dumb.

author: Richard Stallman
quote: Creativity can be a social contribution, but only in so so far as society is free to use the results.

author: Steve Prefontaine
quote: To give anything less than your best is to sacrifice the gift.

author: Grant Cardone
quote: Fear is an indicator of moving in the right direction.

author: Casey Neistat
quote: The Grind is not Glamorous.

author: Alan Lakein
quote: Failing to plan is planning to fail.

author: Chip Heath
quote: The Curse of Knowledge: when we are given knowledge, it is impossible to imagine what it's like to LACK that knowledge.

author: Richard Stallman
quote: Value your freedom or you will lose it, teaches history.

author: Yoda
quote: Do, or do not. There is no try.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can or think you can't you're right.

author: Will Durant
quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

author: Victor Fontanez
quote: The grass isn't greener on the other side, the grass is greener where you water it at.

author: Walter Rugaber
quote: The humanities remind us that weâ€™re part of a civilized society.

author: Richard P. Feynman
quote: What I cannot create I do not understand.

author: Richard P. Feynman
quote: Know how to solve every problem that has been solved.

author: Richard P. Feynman
quote: Study hard what interests you the most in the most undisciplined, irreverent and original manner possible.

author: Noam Chomsky
quote: If we do not believe in freedom of speech for those we despise, we do not believe in it at all.

author: Noam Chomsky
quote: I was never aware of any other option but to question everything.

author: Spock
quote: Live Long and Prosper.

author: Obi-Wan Kenobi
quote: May the Force be with you.

author: Patrick Henry
quote: Give me liberty or give me death!

author: John Stark
quote: Live Free or Die.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.

author: Charles Thompson
quote: Every day is a good day, even the bad ones.
